about_the_game:
The official Cycle Chaser H-5 contains over 2 dozen tracks ranging from levels, bosses, and menu jingles. Authentically composed for YM2612+SN76489 chipset.

This download includes MP3 and WAV versions of the album.

Note: Due to differences between export software functionality, a few songs have differences in the official soundtrack compared to their game counterparts. They are as follows:
  • 13 - It Moves
detailed_description:
The official Cycle Chaser H-5 contains over 2 dozen tracks ranging from levels, bosses, and menu jingles. Authentically composed for YM2612+SN76489 chipset.

name: Cycle Chaser H-5 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 111 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 923 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (disk space is unzipped folder file size)

short_description: JAM LOUD!! ARCHIVE OF PSYCHOSIS COMES ALIVE!!
